ENUS: Reverse analyze the Black Mist code in the wreckage and attempt to utilize the data link associated with the Mechanical Energy Program. Reduce the build speed of dark fog ground nests.

Name: 海洋丛林介绍
ZHCN:
海洋丛林星球上有60%-70%的地表被淡水海洋所覆盖，丰沛的水资源在大陆上孕育出繁茂的雨林。
　　这里的赤道附近往往有连绵不绝的降雨，而纬度更低的地方则随着星球公转有鲜明的雨季和旱季之分。
　　海洋丛林星球上保有巨大的生物量，从而在漫长的演化史中将海洋中的可溶性矿物质逐渐转移到地壳和生物体内。在当地发展工业会动摇这个庞大复杂却又脆弱的生态系统，孰轻孰重，就看怎么取舍了。
ENUS:
Tropicana planets have 60 to 70 percent of their surface covered by bodies of flesh water, nurturing lush rainforests within the continents.
These biomes see continuous rainfall near the equator, while lower latitudes have distinct wet and dry seasons as the planet rotates.
Tropicanas retain a huge biomass, thus gradually transferring soluble minerals from the oceans to the crust and living organisms over its long evolutionary history. Any local industrial development will shake this large, complex, yet fragile ecosystem to its core, but what’s more important - nature, or progress?

Name: 戈壁介绍
ZHCN:
戈壁星球拥有极端稠密的二氧化碳大气层，导致昼夜温差极小，接近地表的地方风速也不高。
　　但无论这类星球曾经的模样如何，都已经被历史上无节制发展的化学工业毁掉了，目前只留下失控的温室效应带来的极高地表温度，以及地表上零星存在的硝酸湖泊。
ENUS:
Gobi planets have extremely dense carbon dioxide atmospheres, resulting in minimal temperature differences between day and night, and low wind speeds near the surface. 
But whatever such planets may have once looked like has been destroyed by the historically uncontrolled development of the chemical industry, leaving at present only extremely high surface temperatures due to the runaway greenhouse effect and the sporadic presence of nitric acid lakes on the surface.

Name: 黑石岩滩介绍
ZHCN:
黑石盐滩星球上拥有以氮气为主要成分的大气层，地表上覆盖着细腻的沙砾和盐花。
　　由于原料丰富，黑石盐滩星球曾作为主要的氯碱工业基地，目前地表上零星存在的盐酸湖泊就是它昔日辉煌的证明。
ENUS:
Halitum planets have an atmosphere dominated by nitrogen and a surface covered by fine sand and salt.
Due to the abundance of raw materials, it served as a major chlor-alkali industrial base, and the hydrochloric acid lakes that now exist sporadically on the surface are a testament to its former glory.

Name: 飓风石林介绍
ZHCN:
飓风石林星球的地表上散布着碎石，拥有一个主要成分为二氧化硫的稠密大气。
　　这类行星拥有活跃的板块构造结构，地震和火山活动频繁。此外，大气中的高浓度亚硫酸雾导致的频繁“酸雨”奇景，也曾是外星旅游爱好者论坛中的一大热门。
ENUS:
The surface of a Cyclonius planet is scattered with the rocks under a thin atmosphere composed mainly of sulfur dioxide.
Such planets possess active tectonic structures with frequent earthquakes and volcanic activities. Additionally, the frequent 'acid rain' phenomenon caused by high concentrations of sulfate aerosols in the atmosphere has also been a popular topic on forums for extraterrestrial travel enthusiasts.

Name: 机甲功率提升
ZHCN: 发电功率提升
ENUS: Power Generation Boost

Name: 星球大气介绍标题
ZHCN: 星球大气类型介绍
ENUS: Planetary Atmosphere Introduction

Name: 星球大气介绍前字
ZHCN:
除部分无大气环境的星球外，现在各类星球各有其独特的大气成分。
大气采集站是类似于轨道采集器的采集设施，可部署在星球上并采集星球大气层的成分供给生产线使用，大气采集站与物流站之间无建造距离限制。
火力发电厂输入的原料种类现受到星球大气类型的限制。除三种化学能燃料棒外，其他燃料不能在无氧大气环境下发电。
ENUS:
Except for some planets with no atmosphere, all types of planets now have their own unique atmospheric composition.
Atmospheric Collect Stations are facilities that can be deployed at a planet and harvest components of the planet's atmosphere for use in production lines. No distance constraints between Atmospheric Collect Station and the Logistics Station.
The type of feedstock input to thermal power plants is now limited by the type of planetary atmosphere.
All but three chemical energy fuel rods cannot generate electricity in an anoxic atmosphere.

Name: 巨型建筑介绍标题
ZHCN: 巨型建筑介绍
ENUS: Mega Buildings Introduction

Name: 巨型建筑介绍前字
ZHCN:
巨型建筑是一类具有高集成度的生产设施。虽然它们看起来与物流站很相似，但并不能装载物流运输机。
一个巨型建筑可将原料或产物通过传送带输出到下一个巨型建筑，从而高效利用占地。
ENUS:
Mega buildings are a class of production facilities with a high degree of integration. Although they look similar to a logistics station, they do not carry a logistics transporter. 
One mega building can export raw materials or products to the next mega building via a conveyor belt, thus making efficient use of space.

Name: 行星协调中心介绍标题
ZHCN: 行星协调中心
ENUS: Coordination Center Introduction

Name: 行星协调中心介绍前字
ZHCN: 一个行星协调中心可为星球工厂提供多种增益，可在行星视图中切换增益以适应不同发展阶段的需求。
ENUS: A Planetary Coordination Center can provide multiple gains for a planetary factory, with the ability to switch gains in the planet view to accommodate different stages of development.

Name: 物质分解设施介绍标题
ZHCN: 物质分解设施
ENUS: Recycling Factory Introduction

Name: 物质分解设施介绍前字
ZHCN:
在选择<color="#FD965ECC">物质回收</color>配方后，物质分解设施可将输入到其中的所有物品按数量比例转换为沙土，并在达到一定数量后静默返还到机甲背包中。
若背包未满，输入的建筑物品可返还75%的制造原料到背包中。
ENUS:
After selecting <color="#FD965ECC">Matter recovery</color> recipe, the Recycling Factory converts all items entered into it into Sand in proportion to their quantity, and silently returns them to package after a certain amount has been reached.
Incoming construction items return 75% of their own manufacturing materials to the package (if the package is not full).

Name: I天穹装配厂

ENUS: A redesigned highly integrated assembly factory where raw materials are grabbed by high-speed robotic arms on conveyor belts and transported to processing centers for processing, assembly, and then transferred to the output end. This factory is able to produce most industrial items with extremely high efficiency.

ENUS: A large factory that uses a cracking beam to process and melt raw ore. High power cracking beams can process minerals with extremely high efficiency, quickly crushing them and processing them into high-purity raw materials.

ENUS: A giant chemical plant consisting of several tens of thousands of ton reactors, high-efficiency cooling towers, and numerous sealed transportation pipelines. When you are in it, it feels like entering a forest of pipes.

ENUS: A large-scale precision factory, with a large amount of transportation tracks, transports raw materials to the precision machining center in the core area for integrated and efficient production，greatly improve the efficiency of manufacturing certain cutting-edge equipment.

Name: I通量矩阵
ZHCN: 整合了电磁矩阵与能量矩阵的复合矩阵。凭借其电磁矩阵部分，通量矩阵可以在特定区域内生成或调节电磁波；而能量矩阵则使其能够储存与分配各种形式的能量，是在能源管理和电磁效应控制方面极为有效的解决方案。
ENUS: It is a composite matrix that integrates the electromagnetic matrix and the energy matrix. With its electromagnetic component, the Flux Matrix can generate or modulate electromagnetic waves within specific areas; the energy matrix allows it to store and distribute various forms of energy. It is an extremely effective solution for energy management and control of electromagnetic effects.

Name: 领域矩阵
ZHCN: 领域矩阵
ENUS: Domain Matrix

ZHCN: 整合了结构矩阵与信息矩阵的复合矩阵。它利用结构矩阵改变物体的物理结构，实现物质的重构与强化；同时，信息矩阵使其能够处理和传输数据，确保信息的高效流动与管理。因其在物质形态和信息处理上的双重掌控能力，被称为“领域矩阵”。
ENUS: It is a composite matrix that integrates the structural matrix and the information matrix. It uses the structural matrix to alter the physical structure of objects, achieving reconfiguration and reinforcement of materials; at the same time, the information matrix enables it to process and transmit data, ensuring efficient flow and management of information. Due to its dual control capabilities in material form and information processing, it is known as the "Domain Matrix."

If you get this book, I guess you should have tried to accept this MOD. Welcome to the first stage, pioneer.
There is not much to do in the first stage, and it will not be difficult.
I hope to see you in the next stage.

ZHCN: 虚空之书

Name: I虚空之书
ZHCN:
我曾经无数次仰望星空，幻想银河彼端是否存在另一个文明。
而现在，你已经踏出了远航星海的第一步。欢迎来到第二阶段，开拓者。
在这个阶段，你需要铺设稳定的物流网络、推动材料技术不断进步，以及逐步发展信息技术。
ENUS:
I have looked up at the stars countless times, and have imagined whether there is another civilization at the other end of the Milky Way.
And now, you have taken the first step of the voyage. Welcome to the second stage, pioneer.
In this stage, you need to lay a stable logistics network, promote material technology to continue to improve, and gradually develop information technology.

Name: 起源之书

Name: T尖端机械组件

Name: T尖端机械组件描述

Name: T钨强化金属

Name: T钨强化金属描述

ENUS: Tungsten-based metal composites produced using nanoscale tungsten metal have extremely high strength and toughness. Perhaps they can be used to produce devices that require high material strength.

Name: T虚拟技术革新
ZHCN: 家园世界: 虚拟技术革新
ENUS: Homeworld: Virtual technology innovation

Name: T虚拟技术革新描述
ZHCN: 光学计算技术的问世标志着一场新的信息技术革命的开始，使用光脉冲信号代替传统电子讯号能够显著降低计算设备的发热量从而提高工作效率，而天然光栅石所制造的新型传输介质让从未有人敢设想的信息传输速度变成了现实。据悉，主脑所维持的家园世界就大量的使用了这种技术。
ENUS: The introduction of optical computing technology marked the beginning of a new revolution in information technology. The use of light pulse signals instead of traditional electronic signals could significantly reduce the heat generated by computing equipment and thus increase work efficiency, while the new transmission medium made of natural lenticular stone made information transmission speeds that no one had ever dared to envision a reality. It is said that the home world maintained by the Mastermind makes extensive use of this technology.

Name: T光学信息传输技术
ZHCN: 家园世界: 光学信息传输技术
ENUS: Homeworld: Optical information transfer technology

Name: T光学信息传输技术描述

ENUS: Using a fiber-like information transmission medium made from natural lenticular stone, this new medium takes information transmission speeds to a whole new level.

Name: T超级量子计算机
ZHCN: 超级量子计算机
ENUS: Super Nano Computer

Name: T超级量子计算机描述

ENUS: Mature quantum computing technology is one of the conditions that measures the level of development of a civilization, and in the case of mastermind computing, it is an important watershed.

ENUS: Advanced computers built with next-generation optical computing technology have superior performance far beyond that of conventional computers.

ENUS: The special lattice structure of the grating stone makes it an ideal carrier for enriching helium atoms. The enriched helium atoms can be used to find a shortcut for making fusion fuel.

利用光子聚束技术将物质分解成粒子态并将其重组为<color="#FD965ECC">沙土</color>，一举两得。
[产出的沙土会直接加入背包中]
ENUS: By using photon beam technology, the material is broken down into particle states and reconstituted into <color="#FD965ECC">sand</color>.

Name: T巨型粒子对撞机
ZHCN: 巨型建筑: 巨型粒子对撞机
ENUS: Mega Buildings: Mega Particle Collider

Name: T巨型建筑工程学描述
ZHCN: 随着生产线的不断扩张，对更高集成度的生产设施的需求愈发迫切。
ENUS: As production lines continue to expand, the need for more integrated production facilities becomes increasingly urgent.

Name: T化学能燃料棒

ENUS: Chemical Fuel Rod

Name: T化学能燃料棒描述

Name: T行星协调中心
ZHCN: 行星协调中心
ENUS: Coordination Center

Name: T行星协调中心描述
ZHCN: 随着星球生产线的不断扩大和算力的发展，部署一个协调中心可以更精确地控制星球工厂。
ENUS: As the production lines on the planet are constantly expanding and the computing power is developing, deploying a coordination center can more accurately control the planet's factories.

Name: 行星协调中心文字描述
ZHCN: 打开行星视图可以对本星球的协调中心进行调整
ENUS: Can open the planet view to adjust the coordination center

Name: T物品仓储描述
ZHCN: 小型储物仓可以搭建在四向分流器上，而大型储物仓具有更大的储量。
ENUS:
Storage Mk.I can be built on Splitter.
Storage Mk.II has twice the capacity.

Name: T物品仓储结果
ZHCN: 你解锁了储物仓，可以将采集到的矿物与生产中的中间产物存入其中。
ENUS:
Storage Mk.I can be built on Splitter.
Storage Mk.II has twice the capacity.

Name: X射线裂解描述
ZHCN: 在氢气的催化作用下，利用高能的X射线将焦油裂解成更多的氢，同时将生产过程中的副产品加工成高能石墨。
ENUS: High-energy X-ray photocatalysis can crack tar into more hydrogen and process the byproducts into energetic graphite.

Name: RX射线裂解
ZHCN: 在氢气的催化作用下，利用高能的X射线将焦油裂解，从而获得更多的氢以及副产品高能石墨。
ENUS: Under the catalysis of hydrogen, X-rays can crack the tar into more hydrogen and a by-product, energetic graphite.

Name: 高强度玻璃描述
ZHCN: 在熔融态的玻璃中掺入一定比例的钛，制成的高强度玻璃，对更复杂、更激烈的工业生产十分实用。
ENUS: Incorporating a specific proportion of titanium into molten glass can create high-strength Titanium Glass which is suitable for more complex industrial production.

Name: 奇异物质描述
ZHCN: 在氘聚变的强大能量作用下，将物质压缩到非常小的点，从而使原子核夸克发生改变，瞬间变成简并态的奇异物质。
ENUS: Under the powerful energy of deuterium fusion, vapor is compressed to an extremely small size which causes the quark's of atomic nucleus to change and instantly degenerate into strange matter.

Name: 基础物流系统描述
ZHCN:
利用<color="#FD965ECC">传送带</color>及<color="#FD965ECC">分拣器</color>将货物从一个地方运输到另一个地方，实现自动化生产。
<color="#FD965ECC">四向分流器</color>可以对货物进行分流或者均衡多条传送带，可使用TAB键切换它的三种样式。
ENUS:
Use the <color="#FD965ECC">Conveyor belt</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Sorter</color> to transport cargo from one place to another to achieve automated production.
<color="#FD965ECC">Splitter</color> can diverge cargo or balance multiple conveyor belts, making the automated production lines more diverse.
Use TAB key to switch styles.

Name: 改良物流系统描述
ZHCN: 将<color="#FD965ECC">流速监测器</color>搭建在传送带上，可以监控传送带上相应位置的实时流速，并且可以设置条件来触发警报。有人用来演奏音乐。
ENUS: The <color="#FD965ECC">Traffic Monitor</color> is built on the conveyor belt to monitor the real-time cargo flow rate at the corresponding location. Conditions can be set to trigger an alarm. Some people use it to play music.

Name: I裂变能源发电站
ZHCN: 新一代的一体化快中子反应堆使用金属铀钚燃料、液态钠冷却池、废料电解精炼处理以及高度自动化技术，产生大量的电力的同时不需要考虑废料的处理。
ENUS: The new generation of integrated fast reactors uses uranium-plutonium metal fuel, liquid sodium cooling pools, electrolytic refining of waste, and highly automated technology to generate large amounts of power without regard to waste disposal.

Name: T裂变发电站描述
ZHCN: 金属铀钚燃料、液态钠冷却池、废料电解精炼处理以及高度自动化技术的综合应用，使一体化快中子反应堆产生大量的电力的同时不需要考虑废料的处理。
ENUS: The new generation of integrated fast reactors uses uranium-plutonium metal fuel, liquid sodium cooling pools, electrolytic refining of waste, and highly automated technology to generate large amounts of power without regard to waste disposal.

Name: T裂变发电站结果
ZHCN: 金属铀钚燃料、液态钠冷却池、废料电解精炼处理以及高度自动化技术的综合应用，使一体化快中子反应堆产生大量的电力的同时不需要考虑废料的处理。
ENUS: The new generation of integrated fast reactors uses uranium-plutonium metal fuel, liquid sodium cooling pools, electrolytic refining of waste, and highly automated technology to generate large amounts of power without regard to waste disposal.

Name: 基础制造台
ZHCN: 基础制造台
ENUS: Basic Assembler

Name: 标准制造单元
ZHCN: 标准制造单元
ENUS: Standard Assembler

Name: I标准制造单元
ZHCN: 具有标准精度的工业母机。可以说，我们的制造水平向前迈进了一大步。
ENUS: Industrial masters with standardized precision. It can be said that our manufacturing level has taken a big step forward.

Name: 高精度装配线
ZHCN: 高精度装配线
ENUS: Precise Assembler

Name: I高精度装配线
ZHCN: 一台用于生产精密仪器的机器，当然，不包括它自己。
ENUS: Used to produce precision instruments, oh of course not have itself.

Name: T标准制造单元描述
ZHCN: 经过工业水平的进步，可以制造具有标准精度的工业母机。
ENUS: Through industrial advancement, it is possible to manufacture industrial master machines with standardized precision.

Name: T高精度加工技术描述
ZHCN: 利用先进机械组件和处理器的算力，提升制造精度。
ENUS: Leverage the arithmetic power of advanced mechanical components and processors to improve manufacturing accuracy.

Name: 钛矿冶炼描述
ZHCN: 采矿和冶炼技术的进步，使得矿物控制更加容易，现在可以开采利用钛矿和钨矿了。
ENUS: The Advancements in mining and smelting technology have made ore control easier. Titanium and Tungsten can now be mined and utilized.

Name: 钛矿冶炼结果
ZHCN: 你掌握了钛矿冶炼技术，现在可以将开采利用钛矿和钨矿了。
ENUS: You have mastered the Titanium Ore Smelting Techniques, Titanium and Tungsten can now be mined and utilized.

Name: 高分子化工结果
ZHCN: 你解锁了高分子化工技术，现在可以合成更多种类的化工原料。
ENUS: You have unlocked Polymer Chemical Technology. A wider variety of chemicals can now be synthesized.

Name: 先进化工结果
ZHCN: 你解锁了先进化工技术，现在可以合成更多种类的化工原料。
ENUS: You have unlocked Advanced Chemical Technology. A wider variety of chemicals can now be synthesized.

Name: 卡西米尔晶体结果
ZHCN: 你解锁了卡西米尔晶体，它标志着我们正将尖端物理学应用于生产。
ENUS: You have unlocked the Casimir Crystal. It signifies that we are applying cutting-edge physics to production.

Name: 人造恒星结果
ZHCN: 你解锁了发电设施：人造恒星。我们在地上，重现恒星的权能。
ENUS: You have unlocked the power generation facility, the Mini-sun. We are on earth, reproducing the power of the stars.

Name: 基础制造工艺结果
ZHCN: 你解锁了基础制造单元，可以将铁块、铜块等原材料制造成更高级的产物。
ENUS: You have unlocked the Basic Manufacturing Unit. It can make iron and copper ingots into more advanced products.

Name: 基础物流系统结果
ZHCN: 你解锁了自动化物流的基础设施━━传送带、分拣器和四向分流器，你可以用它们来将货物自动运送到你想要的地方。
ENUS: You have unlocked automated logistics, the Conveyor Belt, Sorter and Splitter. You can use them to automatically transport the ores gathered in the mining machine for smelting.

Name: 改良物流系统结果
ZHCN: 你解锁了速度更快的传送带与分拣器，以及监测物流系统工作状态的流速监测器。
ENUS: You have unlocked a conveyor belt with a larger carrying capacity, a sorter with faster speed. Traffic Monitor is built on the conveyor belt to monitor the real-time cargo flow rate at the corresponding location. Conditions can be set to trigger an alarm.

Name: I铁矿
ZHCN: 采集铁矿脉获得，可以直接冶炼成铁块，是重要的原料。
ENUS: Used to smelt iron ingots. Obtained by gathering iron vein.

Name: I有机晶体
ZHCN: 稀有矿物。如此多的有机物以非生命的晶体形式存在，这种奇特的矿物或许在尖端工业生产中可以发挥特殊作用。
ENUS: Rare minerals. With so much organic matter in non-living crystalline form, this peculiar mineral may have a special role to play in cutting-edge industrial production.

Name: I大型储物仓
ZHCN: 是小型储物仓容量的两倍，但制作需要的材料也是两倍。
ENUS: Has twice the capacity of a Storage Mk.I. Materials requires twice too.

Name: I人造恒星
ZHCN: 其外围有三个使用高强度合金制造的环形结构，能够精准生成磁场约束其中的等离子体并模拟恒星反应进行发电。
ENUS: It is surrounded by three rings made of high-strength alloys that precisely generate a magnetic field to confine the plasma therein and simulate stellar reactions for power generation.

Name: I位面熔炉
ZHCN: 利用位面过滤器的自组织量子效应能产生热力学负温度流，能够极大地加速矿石熔炼或提纯的过程。
ENUS: Using the Plane Filter produce a quantum effect of self-organizing and can generate a thermodynamic negative temperature flow, the process of ores smelting or purification can be greatly accelerated.

Name: 位面冶金描述
ZHCN: 研究发现，如果用波函数干扰技术对磁单极子的量子态进行过滤，能激发出热力学负温度流。利用这个原理，可以极大地加速矿石熔炼或提纯的过程。
ENUS: Research shows that the Plane Filter produce a quantum effect of self-organizing and a thermodynamic negative temperature flow can be generated. Using this technology, the process of ores smelting or purification can be greatly accelerated.

Name: 位面冶金结果
ZHCN: 你解锁了更高级的熔炉━━<color="#FD965ECC">位面熔炉</color>，它的速度是电弧熔炉的2倍！
ENUS: You have unlocked the more advanced smelter ━━ <color="#FD965ECC">Plane Smelter</color>, which is twice as fast as an Arc Smelter!

Name: I钨矿
ZHCN: 稀有矿物。钨作为化学性质稳定的重金属通常埋藏于行星深处，但在特殊的地质构造条件下，深层岩浆热液的硅铝或碳酸盐建造作用可作用于表层岩体，使星球的表面出现成规模的钨矿。
ENUS: A rare mineral. As a chemically stable heavy metal, tungsten is usually buried deep in the planet, but under special geological and tectonic conditions, the silica-aluminum or carbonate building action of deep magmatic hydrothermal fluids can act on the surface rocks and cause tungsten ores to appear on the planet's surface.

Name: I焦油
ZHCN: 有刺激性气味的粘稠液体，密度较大，富含多种芳香族、杂环和支链化合物且便于提取，是一种重要的化工原料。可由煤炭干馏，或由石油分离获得。
ENUS: Viscous liquid with irritating odor, high density, rich in many aromatic, heterocyclic and branched chain compounds and easy to extract, it is an important chemical raw material. It can be obtained by dry distillation of coal or separation of oil.

Name: I放射性矿物
ZHCN: 超重元素由类质同象作用部分取代了成岩矿物的金属离子，形成的具有放射性的岩石，可从中分离出多种具有工业价值的超重元素化合物。
ENUS: Superheavy elements are radioactive rocks formed by the partial replacement of metal ions in rock-forming minerals by homogeneous isomorphism, from which a variety of superheavy element compounds of industrial value can be isolated.

Name: I铀矿
ZHCN: 经提炼后，矿石中的铀浓度已经已经相当可观。
ENUS: After refinements, the concentration of uranium in the ore is already considerable.

Name: I钚矿
ZHCN: 经提炼后，矿石中的钚浓度已经相当可观。
ENUS: After refinements, the concentration of plutonium in the ore is already considerable.

Name: I含铀核燃料
ZHCN: 铀矿提炼产物，已经可以支撑链式反应。
ENUS: The product of refining uranium ore, which can support the chain reaction.

Name: I含钚核燃料
ZHCN: 钚矿提炼产物，已经可以支撑链式反应。
ENUS: The product of refining plutonium ore, which can support the chain reaction.

ZHCN: 铝矿脉
ENUS: Aluminum Veins

ENUS: Aluminum ore

Name: I铝矿
ZHCN: 采集铝矿脉获得，可以直接冶炼成铝块。
ENUS: Used to smelt aluminum ingots. Obtained by gathering aluminum vein.

Name: 硫矿脉
ZHCN: 硫矿脉
ENUS: Sulfur Veins

Name: 硫矿
ZHCN: 硫矿
ENUS: Sulfur ore

Name: I硫矿
ZHCN: 采集硫矿脉获得，经处理后可用于制造硫酸。
ENUS: Obtained by collecting sulphur vein, it is treated and used in making sulphuric acid.

Name: 铝块
ZHCN: 铝块
ENUS: Aluminum Ingot

Name: I铝块
ZHCN: 基本原材料之一。用于制造各种铝质组件。
ENUS: Basic raw material. Used to produce various aluminum components.

Name: 铝矿粉
ZHCN: 铝矿粉
ENUS: Aluminum Ore Dust

Name: I铝矿粉
ZHCN: 对铝矿进行预先粉碎处理的产物，可明显提高熔炉的效率。
ENUS: The product of pre-crushing of aluminum ore, which can significantly improve the efficiency of the furnace.

Name: 铝合金
ZHCN: 铝合金
ENUS: Aluminum Alloy

Name: I铝合金
ZHCN: 轻金属材料之一，可作结构材料使用。由于具有较高的强度和良好的耐蚀性和可焊性，有着广泛的应用。
ENUS: One of the light metal materials, can be used as structural materials. It has a wide range of applications due to its high strength and good corrosion resistance and weldability.

Name: I氦
ZHCN: 宇宙中丰度第二高的元素，“太阳的元素”。
ENUS: The second most abundant element in the universe, "the element of the sun".

Name: I氦三
ZHCN: 稳定的氦同位素，它与重氢发生的聚变反应即是恒星的秘密。
ENUS: A stable isotope of helium, whose fusion reaction with heavy hydrogen is the secret of the star.

Name: I反物质约束单元
ZHCN: 可以约束一单位反物质的磁阱。
ENUS: The magnetic trap that can confine one unit of antimatter.

Name: I氦闪约束器
ZHCN: 以强大的磁场约束等离子体在其中环绕，坚固的材料甚至可以承受氦闪的冲击。
ENUS: With a strong magnetic field to bind the plasma around it, the robust material can even withstand the impact of a helium flash.

Name: I光子结晶
ZHCN: 利用庞大的能量将大量临界光子约束在一小块区域，使其具有部分晶体性质。
ENUS: The massive energy is used to confine a large number of critical photons to a small region, giving them partially crystalline properties.

Name: I三元精金
ZHCN: 在特殊力场的作用下，使强相互作用力溢出至宏观尺度而形成的材料，是具象化的“坚固”概念。
ENUS: A material formed by the spillover of strong interaction forces to the macroscopic scale under the action of a special force field - a figurative concept of "solidity".

Name: I钨块
ZHCN: 冶炼钨矿获得。这种元素具有划时代的潜力。
ENUS: Obtained by smelting tungsten ore. This element has epoch-making potential.

Name: I钨强化玻璃
ZHCN: 当反应剧烈到钛强化玻璃也很难承受时，就轮到它登场了。
ENUS: When the reaction is so violent that even titanium-reinforced glass is difficult to withstand, it is its turn to make an appearance.

Name: I钨合金
ZHCN: 加入钨的合金。在电磁力的领域中，它就是王者。
ENUS: An alloy with tungsten added. In the field of electromagnetic force, it is the king.

ENUS: It is used to collect resources from gas giants. It use radioisotope thermoelectric generator to power the collector to work in orbit.

嗯……现在是2022年，一月三十日，大年二十九的凌晨三点半。

我只希望我能做到心目中的最好。
凌晨四点。
我给自己定下的目标是，二月底之前，一个月。
我希望自己能做到。
晚安。

我感觉自己受到了双重打击……api作者做出了我梦寐以求的东西，他的源码我却看不懂。
我还能坚持下去吗？这个企划会胎死腹中吗？
……………………
好吧，也许会。我很不愿意这么说……但恐怕这次，我只能做出一个半成品了。

那自然是……拿来主义）

ZHCN:
当地时间2022年2月4日-条目2
现在是，2022.02.04，星期五，凌晨一点四十六分。
我感觉我所学不多且不成体系的编程知识在此刻受到了严重冲击。
写下上一条日志的时候，我的工程文件不管怎么编译，修改，都在报错。
我debug了将近一个小时，始终无果。
就在刚才，我第不知道多少次重新编译源码——
嘿，您猜怎么着？
我的代码跑起来辣！
草。

化工线的第一个配方终于成功写入。
这是第一步，但绝不是最后一步。

草。

此变量超出预期，申请解锁武器保险……
授权通过，安全协议解除……
允许部署自卫火力……

Warning, Dark Fog activity index perversely rising...

Name: 钢芯弹箱
ZHCN: 钢芯弹箱
ENUS: Steel Ammo Box

Name: I钢芯弹箱
ZHCN: 在纯铜子弹的工艺上进行改进的钢芯弹药，其拥有一层铜质被甲，拥有更加良好的穿透性能。一个弹箱包含30发子弹。
ENUS: Steel-core ammunition that improves on the process of pure copper bullets by having a layer of copper armor for even better penetration. One case contains 30 rounds.

Name: 钨芯弹箱
ZHCN: 钨芯弹箱
ENUS: Tungsten Ammo Box

Name: I钨芯弹箱
ZHCN: 使用钨作为弹头材料的进阶全金属被甲弹，沉重的钨芯弹头与硬质金属被甲能够有效穿透黑雾的防御装甲，造成可观的伤害。一个弹箱包含30发子弹。
ENUS: An advanced full metal armor round that uses tungsten as the warhead material, the heavy tungsten core warhead and hard metal armor can effectively penetrate the Black Mist's defensive armor and deal considerable damage. One case contains 30 rounds.

Name: 三元弹箱
ZHCN: 三元弹箱
ENUS: Ternary Adamantium Ammo Box

Name: I三元弹箱
ZHCN: 使用三元精金制作的弹药，这种强互作用力材料曾用于建造深空探测器“水滴”，其强度足以做出“锐角转弯”这种超级机动而不解体。得益于其坚固性，这种弹头有着无与伦比的穿透力。一个弹箱包含30发子弹。
ENUS: Ammunition made of Ternary Adamantium, a strong interaction material used in the construction of the deep space probe "Water Drop", strong enough to perform super maneuvers such as the "Sharp Angle Turn" without disintegrating. Thanks to its robustness, the warhead has unrivaled penetration power. One case contains 30 rounds.

Name: 核子爆破单元
ZHCN: 核子爆破单元
ENUS: Nuclear Demolition Unit

Name: I核子爆破单元
ZHCN: 在爆破单元的基础上引入链式反应，通过其产生的高温高压环境造成杀伤。不必担心，在连接引信之前，它非常安全。
ENUS: A chain reaction is introduced on top of the crystal blasting unit, causing killing through the high temperature and high pressure environment it creates. No need to worry, it is very safe until the fuse is attached.

Name: 反物质湮灭单元
ZHCN: 反物质湮灭单元
ENUS: Antimatter Annihilation Unit

Name: I反物质湮灭单元
ZHCN:
可控湮灭反应的工业化应用方式之一，原本的放射物装药被正反物质两极替代。
想要激活它只需要三步：同时按下两侧的按钮解除保险，将单元向两侧拉开进入待击发状态，然后合上它。当然，我们不建议您这么做，使用电子引信激活更加可靠，也不会对您造成伤害。
ENUS:
One of the industrialized ways of applying controlled annihilation reaction, the original radioactive charge was replaced by positive and negative matter poles. 
To activate it you only need three steps: press the buttons on both sides at the same time to deactivate the safety, pull the unit away to the sides into a ready-to-fire state, and then close it. Of course, we don't recommend that you do this; using an electronic fuse to activate it is much more reliable and won't harm you.

Name: 微型核弹组
ZHCN: 微型核弹组
ENUS: Mini-nukes Shell Set

Name: I微型核弹组
ZHCN: 一种高效可靠的杀伤性武器，根据主脑的计算，在对抗黑雾的过程中使用这种武器可能造成的污染属于可以接受的代价。一个炮弹组包含12发炮弹。
ENUS: An efficient and reliable anti-personnel weapon, according to the mastermind's calculations, the contamination that may be caused by its use in the fight against the Black Mist is among the acceptable costs. A shell group contains 12 shells.

Name: I聚爆加农炮MK2
ZHCN: 改进的质量投射器能够有效增加这门巨炮的射程，而新的高强度结构材料则可以承受更大的冲击力以抵消质量投射技术带来的巨大后坐，避免对其结构本身造成破坏，即使如此，这门巨炮每次开火仍需要更长时间进行充能。
ENUS: The improved mass projector can effectively increase the range of this cannon, while the new high-strength structural material can withstand greater impact force to offset the huge recoil caused by mass projection technology, avoiding damage to its structure itself. Nevertheless, each firing of this cannon still requires longer charging time.

Name: T虚数空间存储
ZHCN: 虚数空间存储
ENUS: Virtual Space Storage

Name: 虚数空间存储描述
ZHCN:
得当的使用负熵奇点，我们可以利用它打开一道通向虚数空间的裂隙，由于虚数空间的特殊性质，你可以在任何一个地方再次复现这个过程。
<color="#FD965ECC">警告：</color>该科技的相关技术已被COSMO技术伦理委员会禁用，<color="#FD965ECC">请手动研究。</color>
ENUS:
Using the negentropic singularity properly, we can use it to open up a rift to imaginary space, and due to the special nature of imaginary space, you can reproduce the process again anywhere.
<color="#FD965ECC">Warning:</color> This technology has been prohibited by the COSMO Technology Ethics Committee. <color="#FD965ECC">Please initiate such research manually.</color>

Name: 虚数空间存储结果
ZHCN: 你解锁了量子储物仓，它的内部始终指向一个特殊空间，你可以利用这一特性轻松跨越数十光年的距离进行物品传输。
ENUS: You unlock the Quantum Depot, whose interior always points to a special space, and you can use this property to easily transfer items across distances of tens of light years.

Name: 量子储物仓
ZHCN: 量子储物仓
ENUS: Quantum Depot

Name: I量子储物仓
ZHCN:
借助负熵奇点，我们能够凿穿物质界限，打开通往虚数空间的大门。量子储物仓在虚数空间上切割出一小块独立的区域，并以此进行物品存储。
所有的量子储物仓内部都指向同一个空间，你放入其中的物品可以在<color="#FD965ECC">任何一个</color>量子储物仓中拿出来。
ENUS:
With the help of a negative entropy singularity, we are able to chisel through the boundaries of matter and open the door to imaginary space. Quantum depot cut out a small, separate area on imaginary space and use it for item storage. 
 All quantum storage bins point to the same space internally, and items you put in them can be taken out in <color="#FD965ECC">any</color> quantum depot.

Name: I熔炉 Mk.III
ZHCN:
在不断输入能量后，熔炉内部被激发的负熵奇点可以稳定地输出负熵，利用核心素的稳定性，可以进一步约束处于激发态的负熵奇点，引导其击穿物质界限。我们能够借此从虚数空间中解构粒子信息，并将其转换为实在的物质。
负熵熔炉能够将配方<color="#FD965ECC">翻倍产出</color>，你只需要输入一份原料，就能得到两份成品。
ENUS:
With the constant input of energy, the excited negentropic singularity inside the furnace can stabilize the output of negentropy, and by using the stability of the core elements, the negentropic singularity in the excited state can be further constrained and guided to penetrate the boundaries of matter. We are able to use this to deconstruct particle information from imaginary number space and convert it into additional real matter. The 
 Negentropic Furnace is able to <color="#FD965ECC">double the output of the recipe</color>, you only need to input one ingredient to get two finished products.

Name: I星际物流运输站
ZHCN:
巨大的太空电梯，实现了行星之间更便捷的物资运输，可以将星球工厂连结成一个庞大的工业帝国。
<color="#FD965ECC">“于上天入地之处，取寰宇无穷之物。”</color>
ENUS:
Giant space elevators make it easier to transport materials between planets. They can connect planet factories to a massive industrial empire.
<color="#FD965ECC">"From heaven to the earth, take infinite things in the worlds."</color>
